description: Returns attributes for one or more collections, including the collection endpoint and the OpenSearch Dashboards endpoint. For more information, see Creating and managing Amazon OpenSearch Serverless collections.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A list of collection IDs. You can't provide names and IDs in the same request. The ID is part of the collection endpoint. You can also retrieve it using the ListCollections API. (string) ---

parameters.name: names
parameters.description: A list of collection names. You can't provide names and IDs in the same request. (string) ---

nested_items.name: collectionDetails
nested_items.description: Details about each collection.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the collection.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the collection.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the collection.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of collection.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the collection.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collection.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Web Services KMS key used to encrypt the collection.

nested_items.name: standbyReplicas
nested_items.description: Details about an OpenSearch Serverless collection.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The Epoch time when the collection was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the collection was last modified.

nested_items.name: collectionEndpoint
nested_items.description: Collection-specific endpoint used to submit index, search, and data upload requests to an OpenSearch Serverless collection.

nested_items.name: dashboardEndpoint
nested_items.description: Collection-specific endpoint used to access OpenSearch Dashboards.

nested_items.name: failureCode
nested_items.description: A failure code associated with the request.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: A message associated with the failure code.

nested_items.name: collectionErrorDetails
nested_items.description: Error information for the request.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: If the request contains collection IDs, the response includes the IDs provided in the request.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: If the request contains collection names, the response includes the names provided in the request.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: A description of the error. For example, The specified Collection is not found.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the request. For example, NOT_FOUND.
